Developed countries has higher rate of crime, drugs, serial killings and prostitution because new world order measure "development" materially.  On that sense, We Sri Lankans are far more developed and civilized than them!  Our police will not kill pedestrians, our military will not use nano-thermite to demolish buildings. With the development people will behave as animals! Develop countries always trying to make troubles to poor countries. Now these people have no aims of living, earning, growing children etc. everything goes as it is! So, they will ruin their countries before these poor countries. If you know how Rome and Greece have vanished by natural disasters you will learn what happen to those Kaama Bogee lives. By creating such opportunities even, you cannot Colette your satisfaction. Your desire will never end! So this is an futile effect. Most of the western young crowd now have collapsed family Ives! As Asians you have to focus to your partner and should live your short period of life with satisfaction. All these western people are appraising the values of Asian life. They know that we are poor and suffering because of that. But they still value our culture.

Every civilisation that we had forever had some sort of prostitution. Pretending that it is a part of developed society is ridiculously stupid.  Rome or Greece did not fell due to natural disasters. That happened due to internal conflicts and most importantly invading armies like Alexander the Great and Visigoths. You need to read a history book. Also, natural disasters do not happen due to sin. It happens due to Utu Niyama. You need to read a book or two in Buddhism too. Also dont forget that prostitution was common in pre-colonized Sri Lanka. Maybe we were conquered because of that sin?  I live in a western world with a "Collapsed family lives". But most families that I know live very happily and lovingly. Also, most of the Asians that I know are doing there best to migrate into this collapsed western sociaty.  I cannot believe that there are morons who still believe that kaama bogee lives bring natural disasters. These are the stuff that was told by illiterate tribal people.
